javadoc: A simple class to contain the various settings for demangling.

methods.javadoc:
True signals to apply function signatures that are demangled.
@param doSignature True signals to apply function signatures that are demangled.
methods.name: applySignature
methods.comment: True signals to apply function signatures that are demangled.

methods.javadoc:
True signals to apply function signatures that are demangled.
@param doSignature True signals to apply function signatures that are demangled.
methods.name: setApplySignature
methods.comment: True signals to apply function signatures that are demangled.

methods.name: doDisassembly
methods.comment:
True signals to perform disassembly for known data structures (like functions) when 
 demangling.

methods.name: setDoDisassembly
methods.comment:
True signals to perform disassembly for known data structures (like functions) when 
 demangling.

methods.javadoc:
True signals to only demangle symbol names that follow known mangled patterns.  False triggers
 all symbols to be demangled, which results in some symbols getting demangled that were not
 actually mangled symbols.
@param demangleOnlyKnownPatterns True signals to only demangle symbol names that follow 
 known mangled patterns.
methods.name: demangleOnlyKnownPatterns
methods.comment:
True signals to only demangle symbol names that follow known mangled patterns.  False triggers
 all symbols to be demangled, which results in some symbols getting demangled that were not
 actually mangled symbols.

methods.javadoc:
True signals to only demangle symbol names that follow known mangled patterns.  False triggers
 all symbols to be demangled, which results in some symbols getting demangled that were not
 actually mangled symbols.
@param demangleOnlyKnownPatterns True signals to only demangle symbol names that follow 
 known mangled patterns.
methods.name: setDemangleOnlyKnownPatterns
methods.comment:
True signals to only demangle symbol names that follow known mangled patterns.  False triggers
 all symbols to be demangled, which results in some symbols getting demangled that were not
 actually mangled symbols.

params.name: demangleOnlyKnownPatterns
params.comment:
True signals to only demangle symbol names that follow 
 known mangled patterns.

name: DemanglerOptions
comment: A simple class to contain the various settings for demangling.
